title: Can't turn the green online light off
body:
The green bubble that appears alongside your name and icon on the top right corner of the  client that shows if you're online/in queue/offline, etc stays green. I can't change it to the red away.  So yup, tiny insignificant problem but figured I'd ask if anyone else experienced this or knew what causes it, etc? 
Thanks!

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up! We noticed this as well shortly after the patch dropped, and we're still currently looking into why exactly that status button stopped working. I'll do my best to spread the word once it's been fixed, but you can also look for updates on our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news)!
